text: Sol Heras (born 8 October 1987) is an English actor. He is best known for his second acting for the portraying character of Ryan Connor in the longest- running television soap opera Coronation Street, from 2012 until 2013, and his replace by Ben Thompson, and in turning replacing by Ryan Prescott in 2018. == Early life == Heras was born on 8 October 1987, and raised in Cheshire. Category:1987 births Category:Actors Category:Living people Category:People from Cheshire
title: Sol Heras
